name: @zerobias-org/module-avigilon-alta-access-hub-sdk
description: module-avigilon-alta-access-hub-sdk Hub SDK (with Hub routing support)

scripts.sync-meta: VERSION=$(npm run -s get-version) NAME=$(yq -oy e .name package.json) DESC=$(yq -oy e .description package.json) yq e -i '.info.version=strenv(VERSION) | .info.title=strenv(NAME) | .info.description=strenv(DESC)' generated/api.yml
scripts.generate:full: cd generated && cp api.yml full.yml && if test -f connectionProfile.yml; then yq e -i '.components.schemas.ConnectionProfile.$ref'=\"./connectionProfile.yml\" full.yml; fi
scripts.generate:inflate: cd generated && npx redocly bundle -o full2.yml full.yml && mv full2.yml full.yml && cp full.yml api.yml
scripts.generate: npm run generate:full && npm run generate:inflate && npm run generate:api && npm run generate:fix
scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run validate && npm run transpile

author: team@zerobias.com
